data.address: Smith Lake Camp Ground Bldg A-2812 Smith Lake rd., Ft. Bragg, NC 28310
data.details:
Troops who participate in camping activities are required to have an Outdoor skills certified adult. Outdoor skills is offered in 2 parts- a planning session AND an overnight compoent where adults will learn how to prepare and implement a successful Girl Scout camping trip! Troop leaders may recruit parents/helpers to take this course and serve as the outdoor-trained adult. Outdoor-trained volunteers must be registered memebers & have successfully completed a criminal background check through the council. Both of these items need to be completed prior to registering for training. Both planning and overnight sessions must be completed by the same person to be an outdoor skills class. Partcipants must attend both sessions. Planning Session- July 18, 2014 - 6:00am-9:00pm Fayetteville Service Center. Overnight Session- 10:00am Saturday, July 26, 2014- Noon Sunday, July 27, 2014, Smith Lake Camp Ground Bldg A-2812 Smith Lake Road is now permanently closed. Please view Honeycutt Road Access Map onto Smith Lake Road.

Register This Event
data.srchdisp: Troops who participate in camping activities are required to have an Outdoor skills certified adult.
